attributes.action: Separate cyclists from motor traffic from Stockwell to Elephant & Castle.
attributes.additional_details: Cycling is becoming more and more popular, thousand of cyclist are using the cycle lane but safety is an issue and there has been some recent accidents reported. Our cause is for safety, improving conditions and decreasing pollutions. As well as keeping Londoners healthy!!
attributes.background: The use of cycling over the years has dramatically increased and hence the need for more safety for cyclists is key to reduce pollution into zone one. Our ask is to build a fully segregated two-way cycle track to separate cyclists from motor traffic from Stockwell to Elephant & Castle.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
